DOC.brief_summary: Ankylosing spondylitis ( AS ) rheumatoid disease affect segment axial skeleton , lead complete fusion spinal segment - bamboo-spine . During last decade biological disease modify anti-rheumatic drug ( bDMARD ) successfully introduce reduce disease activity . It unclear whether bDMARD treatment effect spinal fracture risk relate AS . This national registry study investigate effect bDMARD treatment spinal fracture risk national cohort patient AS .
